item.title: teach yourself to code
item.description: as i left the colorado mountains to fly to NYC, it finally hit me. i spent the last three years of my life teaching myself to code, and for the first time, it felt real. like this was what I was meant to do. this blog post is a work in progress my coding journey began with a question. hey, Zac. can you analyze our portfolioâ€™s cluster risk?
